review: The Chromecast is a great way to instantly upgrade your "dumb" TV into a smart TV. While the apps are still limited, it does a great job of allowing you to select the content you want to watch from your phone instead of having to squint and read the fine print on your TV from 12 feet away. I would recommend buying one for every room in the house (that has a TV of course).
